# Project Brief: dshohat.github.io

## Overview
Personal portfolio and project showcase website for Drory Shohat, an AI & Hardware Engineer at Intel Israel.

## Core Purpose
- Professional portfolio showcasing career and skills
- Private section for personal projects (games, recipes, podcasts)
- Family content preservation (podcasts with 92-year-old father)

## Target Audience
- Professional contacts and recruiters
- Family members accessing personal content
- Anyone interested in the interactive games

## Key Requirements
- Static site (GitHub Pages hosted)
- No build tools or frameworks
- Bilingual support (English + Hebrew)
- Mobile responsive design
- Fast loading, no dependencies
